events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will start the review process promptly.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering based on the submitted resume mentioning software development experience.
Recruiter Alice has been assigned to coordinate with the candidate and guide them through the engineering recruitment process.
Initial screening interview completed successfully where candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development best practices.
Candidate responded promptly and positively confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 5th to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
Candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance in algorithms, data structures, and coding exercises.
HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and career aspirations.
HR interview completed positively with the candidate showing alignment with company values and enthusiasm for the role.
A formal job offer for the software engineer position has been proposed with competitive compensation and benefits.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Candidate has officially accepted the job offer and is looking forward to starting the new role as a software engineer.
Onboarding process started with orientation sessions and setup of development environment for the new engineer.
Hiring process officially closed with the successful placement of the candidate into the engineering team.
